text: Anderson Esiti (born 24 May 1994) is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Hungarian NB I club Ferencváros and the Nigeria national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Leixões 2013–14 LigaPro 36 0 3 0 7 0 — — 46 0 Estoril 2014–15 Primeira Liga 17 0 1 0 3 0 5 0 — 26 0 2015–16 25 0 3 0 1 0 — — 29 0 2016–17 2 0 — — — — 2 0 Total 44 0 4 0 4 0 5 0 — 57 0 Gent 2016–17 Belgian First Division A 25 0 2 0 — 8 0 — 35 0 2017–18 26 0 3 0 — 1 0 — 30 0 2018–19 26 0 4 0 — 0 0 — 30 0 Total 77 0 9 0 — 9 0 — 95 0 PAOK 2019–20 Superleague Greece 21 0 4 0 — 4 0 — 29 0 2020–21 9 0 0 0 — 4 0 — 13 0 2021–22 11 0 1 0 — 8 0 — 20 0 Total 41 0 5 0 — 16 0 — 62 0 Göztepe (loan) 2020–21 Süper Lig 20 1 0 0 — — — 20 1 Ferencváros 2021–22 Nemzeti Bajnokság I 9 1 3 0 — 0 0 — 12 1 2022–23 21 1 1 0 — 13 0 — 35 1 2023–24 2 0 0 0 — 4 0 — 6 0 Total 32 2 4 0 — 17 0 — 53 2 Career total 250 3 25 0 11 0 47 0 0 0 333 3 ==Honours== ;Ferencvárosi TC * Nemzeti Bajnokság I: 2021–22 * Magyar Kupa: 2021-22 ;PAOK *Greek Football Cup: 2020–21 ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Living people
